name: Critter Casino
description:
Come on in and roll the dice at the Critter Casino! WARNING: Best works in fullscreen on a 16:9 monitor

Windows download version also available

You command an army of insects, all driven by their motivation to protect the stacks of chips on their poker table home. The table is in trouble, however, as gamblers are reaching in to steal their precious chips. At your disposal, you have two dice: one for choosing which insect is placed, and one for upgrading the insects that are already there. Be careful upgrading though, because if you roll too high, you might bust!

  • Roll critter dice to place units on the board
  • Roll upgrade dice to power up your units
  • Swat away pesky gamblers
  • Upload your high score to the leaderboard! (WINDOWS ONLY, SORRY!)

Meet the Critters!


Shootin' Worm
Slowing Snail
Blasting Ant
Producer Bee
The Spider
Stack of Cards

Shootin' Worm: shoots a bullet at any approaching hand

Slowing Snail: shoots a bullet that slows down any approaching hand

Exploding Ant: when a hand gets too close, this ant will explode to deal massive damage

Producer Bee: increases the rate at which you get more dice to roll

The Spider: shoots its web in every direction to attack the hands

Stack of Cards: a large unit that distracts the hands and protects whatever is behind it

Watch out for gamblers!

The gamblers have one solitary focus: steal your chips! They will squash any bug that stands in their way.
